titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on manganese metal flake containing at least 99.5 percent by weight of manganese.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/16/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on manganese metal flake containing at least 99.5% by weight of manganese.
